github-pages.description: Deploy to GitHub Pages with custom domain
steps: 1. Add your custom domain to the CNAME file
2. Configure DNS settings with your domain provider
3. Enable GitHub Pages in repository settings
4. Set custom domain in GitHub Pages settings
1. Connect your GitHub repository to Netlify
2. Set build settings (no build command needed)
3. Configure custom domain in Netlify dashboard
4. Update DNS settings with your domain provider
1. Import project from GitHub to Vercel
2. No build configuration needed for static site
3. Add custom domain in Vercel dashboard
1. Copy all files to your web server directory
2. Configure web server to serve static files

seo_considerations: Notify search engines of domain change
